debug-scopes.h

5#ifndef V8_DEBUG_DEBUG_SCOPES_H_
6#define V8_DEBUG_DEBUG_SCOPES_H_
7
8#include "src/debug/debug-frames.h"
9#include "src/parsing/parse-info.h"
10
11namespace v8 {
12namespace internal {
13
14class JavaScriptFrame;
15class ParseInfo;
16
17// Iterate over the actual scopes visible from a stack frame or from a closure.
18// The iteration proceeds from the innermost visible nested scope outwards.
19// All scopes are backed by an actual context except the local scope,
20// which is inserted "artificially" in the context chain.
21class V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE ScopeIterator {
22 public:
23 enum ScopeType {
24 ScopeTypeGlobal = 0,
25 ScopeTypeLocal,
26 ScopeTypeWith,
27 ScopeTypeClosure,
28 ScopeTypeCatch,
29 ScopeTypeBlock,
30 ScopeTypeScript,
31 ScopeTypeEval,
32 ScopeTypeModule
33 };
34
35 static const int kScopeDetailsTypeIndex = 0;
36 static const int kScopeDetailsObjectIndex = 1;
37 static const int kScopeDetailsNameIndex = 2;
38 static const int kScopeDetailsStartPositionIndex = 3;
39 static const int kScopeDetailsEndPositionIndex = 4;
40 static const int kScopeDetailsFunctionIndex = 5;
41 static const int kScopeDetailsSize = 6;
42
43 enum class ReparseStrategy {
44 kFunctionLiteral,
45 // Checks whether the paused function (and its scope chain) already has
46 // its blocklist calculated and re-parses the whole script if not.
47 // Otherwise only the function literal is re-parsed.
48 kScriptIfNeeded,
49 };
50
51 ScopeIterator(Isolate* isolate, FrameInspector* frame_inspector,
52 ReparseStrategy strategy);
53
54 ScopeIterator(Isolate* isolate, Handle<JSFunction> function);
55 ScopeIterator(Isolate* isolate, Handle<JSGeneratorObject> generator);
56 ~ScopeIterator();
57
58 Handle<JSObject> MaterializeScopeDetails();
59
60 // More scopes?
61 bool Done() const { return context_.is_null(); }
62
63 // Move to the next scope.
64 void Next();
65
66 // Restart to the first scope and context.
67 void Restart();
68
69 // Return the type of the current scope.
70 ScopeType Type() const;
71
72 // Indicates which variables should be visited. Either only variables from the
73 // scope that are available on the stack, or all variables.
74 enum class Mode { STACK, ALL };
75
76 // Return the JavaScript object with the content of the current scope.
77 Handle<JSObject> ScopeObject(Mode mode);
78
79 // Returns whether the current scope declares any variables.
80 bool DeclaresLocals(Mode mode) const;
81
82 // Set variable value and return true on success.
83 bool SetVariableValue(Handle<String> variable_name, Handle<Object> new_value);
84
85 bool ClosureScopeHasThisReference() const;
86
87 // Populate the set with collected non-local variable names.
88 Handle<StringSet> GetLocals() { return locals_; }
89
90 // Similar to JSFunction::GetName return the function's name or it's inferred
91 // name.
92 Handle<Object> GetFunctionDebugName() const;
93
94 Handle<Script> GetScript() const { return script_; }
95
96 bool HasPositionInfo();
97 int start_position();
98 int end_position();
99
100#ifdef DEBUG
101 // Debug print of the content of the current scope.
102 void DebugPrint();
103#endif
104
105 bool InInnerScope() const { return !function_.is_null(); }
106 bool HasContext() const;
107 bool NeedsContext() const;
108 Handle<Context> CurrentContext() const {
109 DCHECK(HasContext());
110 return context_;
111 }
112
113 private:
114 Isolate* isolate_;
115 std::unique_ptr<ReusableUnoptimizedCompileState> reusable_compile_state_;
116 std::unique_ptr<ParseInfo> info_;
117 FrameInspector* const frame_inspector_ = nullptr;
118 Handle<JSGeneratorObject> generator_;
119
120 // The currently-executing function from the inspected frame, or null if this
121 // ScopeIterator has already iterated to any Scope outside that function.
122 Handle<JSFunction> function_;
123
124 Handle<Context> context_;
125 Handle<Script> script_;
126 Handle<StringSet> locals_;
127 DeclarationScope* closure_scope_ = nullptr;
128 Scope* start_scope_ = nullptr;
129 Scope* current_scope_ = nullptr;
130 bool seen_script_scope_ = false;
131 bool calculate_blocklists_ = false;
132
133 inline JavaScriptFrame* GetFrame() const {
134 return frame_inspector_->javascript_frame();
135 }
136
137 bool AdvanceOneScope();
138 void AdvanceOneContext();
139 void AdvanceScope();
140 void AdvanceContext();
141 void CollectLocalsFromCurrentScope();
142
143 // Calculates all the block list starting at the current scope and stores
144 // them in the global "LocalsBlocklistCache".
145 //
146 // Is a no-op unless `calculate_blocklists_` is true and
147 // current_scope_ == closure_scope_. Otherwise `context_` does not match
148 // with current_scope_/closure_scope_.
149 void MaybeCollectAndStoreLocalBlocklists() const;
150
151 int GetSourcePosition() const;
152
153 void TryParseAndRetrieveScopes(ReparseStrategy strategy);
154
155 void UnwrapEvaluationContext();
156
157 using Visitor = std::function<bool(Handle<String> name, Handle<Object> value,
158 ScopeType scope_type)>;
159
160 Handle<JSObject> WithContextExtension();
161
162 bool SetLocalVariableValue(Handle<String> variable_name,
163 Handle<Object> new_value);
164 bool SetContextVariableValue(Handle<String> variable_name,
165 Handle<Object> new_value);
166 bool SetContextExtensionValue(Handle<String> variable_name,
167 Handle<Object> new_value);
168 bool SetScriptVariableValue(Handle<String> variable_name,
169 Handle<Object> new_value);
170 bool SetModuleVariableValue(Handle<String> variable_name,
171 Handle<Object> new_value);
172
173 // Helper functions.
174 void VisitScope(const Visitor& visitor, Mode mode) const;
175 void VisitLocalScope(const Visitor& visitor, Mode mode,
176 ScopeType scope_type) const;
177 void VisitScriptScope(const Visitor& visitor) const;
178 void VisitModuleScope(const Visitor& visitor) const;
179 bool VisitLocals(const Visitor& visitor, Mode mode,
180 ScopeType scope_type) const;
181 bool VisitContextLocals(const Visitor& visitor, Handle<ScopeInfo> scope_info,
182 Handle<Context> context, ScopeType scope_type) const;
183
184 DISALLOW_IMPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS(ScopeIterator);
185};
186
187} // namespace internal
188} // namespace v8
189
190#endif // V8_DEBUG_DEBUG_SCOPES_H_
